data.name: MALWARE Rewritten
data.detailed_description:
Malware Rewritten is a retro-looking action platformer where you are a virus sent into a computer system to destroy everything you see and gather data on the way.

You warp on a level, find a key for each gate that is blocking your way, and find Datapacks if you can. With every level, levels themselves get progressively more complex as each time, something new appears, which also includes new enemies you may encounter. But sometimes, a big mean antivirus may block your way to stop you from going further. With every boss you beat, you get better upgrades that make you even stronger and deadlier.

Malware Rewritten features:
-Classic platformer mechanics!
-3 different starting difficulties that decide if your death will be a permanent one, or won't matter at all!
-Large levels to dash through!
-Classic bossfights with distinctive set of attacks!
-Datapack collectibles that are scattered around the level! (might find future use)
-3 different powerups you get after defeating minibosses!

data.short_description: A game where you play as a virus, and your goal is to destroy the computer from the inside.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or better
  • Graphics: 256 MB or better
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz or better
  • Graphics: 256 MB or better
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: we use arch btw
